title: Can I play my 1000th game with a riot employee?
body: at 999 wins right now and would love to play a game with any riot employee. Specifically Phreak but I'll play with anyone. Thanks!

replies.body: I'm happy to play too if you are still looking!
Yes! Sorry I still haven't played that last game I was out of town for a few days but if tomorrow you want to play that would be awesome!
I'll play, if you still need someone! :3
Sorry I was out of town! Yes I would love to play if you're still available tomorrow!
No worries! I'll be around all day! I'm PST, if that helps, for coordinating a good time. :3

title: 1000th win not 1000th game

Just saying.

> at 999 wins right now and would love to play a game with any riot employee. Specifically Phreak but I'll play with anyone. Thanks!

I can ask Kung Fu Gopher if he'd like too o: He prob busy tho x.x
